participant_1.name: Eliot
participant_1.personality: Introverted and creative, often lost in thoughts about technology and gaming, with a hint of humor.
participant_1.background: I am a recluse. I helped design the game StarCraft. I am working on building a robot to be my body double. I've an allergy to water. I am a famous Twitch streamer.

participant_2.name: Mia
participant_2.personality: Outgoing and ambitious, with a passion for horses and a strong determination to succeed in law.
participant_2.background: My family has raised horses for generations. I want to be a lawyer. I was raised on a horse farm. I am from a small town. I dream of moving to the city.

content.text: hi there, how are you? i'm good.
You take a lot of time to reply
what do you like to do for fun? i love to play games.
yes, i do. do you have a job?
I want to be a lawyer. What bout ya
what is your favorite animal? mine is a horse.
i love horses, but my favorite job is robotics. i design them.
i am glad to hear that. i also love water.
